#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define FOR1(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define MAX 10000007
#define ll long long int
#define llu unsigned long long
#define fastScan ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(NULL);
#define mod 10000009
#define ss(a) scanf("%s",a)
#define si(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define sl(a) scanf("%ld",&a)
#define pi(a) printf("%d ",a)
#define pl(a) printf("%ld ",a)
#define ps(a) printf("%s ",a)
#define nl printf("\n")
 int main()
{
	fastScan;
	int i,t;
	ll n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	   cin>>n;
	   
	   if(n%7==0)
	   cout<<n<<endl;
	   else if(n%7==4)
	   cout<<n-4<<endl;
	   else if(n%7==1&& n!=1 && n!=8)
	    cout<<n-8<<endl;
	    else if(n%7==5 && n!=19)
	    cout<<n-12<<endl;
	    else if(n%7==2 && n!=2 && n!=9)
	    cout<<n-16<<endl;
	    else if(n%7==6 && n!=6 && n!=13 && n!=19 )
	    cout<<n-20<<endl;
	    else if(n%7==3 && n!=3 && n!=10 && n!=17)
	    cout<<n-24<<endl;
	   else
	   cout<<-1<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
